In every [[Legacy Console Edition tutorial|tutorial world]] of the [[Legacy Console Edition]] between [[Xbox 360 Edition TU5|TU5]] and [[Xbox 360 Edition TU69|TU69]] there are 12 hidden [[Chest|chests]] with [[Music disc|music discs]] in them, which are moved in every [[update]] that changes the tutorial world. Each chest containing a music disc may also contain other [[Item|items]].
